author: dims
msg: Added test cases for testing comma-delimited, space-delimited, '*' in allowedMethods.

author: tomj
msg: I discovered the hard way that RPCProvider.java doesn't like comma-delimited
allowed methods even though the docs claim it's ok.  Sure enough, the only
delimiter specified in the StringTokenizer is a space.  I made the change
and did some minor testing.  I tested a space, a comma, and a comma followed
by a space.  I didn't do anything with whitespace in general or multiple
spaces, multiple commas, etc.  This patch was against rev 1.66 of

author: tomj
msg: Fix a problem with imports that prevented a file based WSDL from importing
Also skip over imports of the soap encoding  schema, as this is built in
(and we choke over some of the Schema types now).
Add tests to the WSDL _import test file to test these two cases.

author: tomj
msg: Fix a bug in xmlNameToJava() function which prevented the serializer and
deserializer from find the meta-data in beans for elements like A1_AAA.
Add some new unit test cases to verify.
